title: Passage west. Program 2: The Awakening
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, British Broadcasting Corporation, Bill Brind and Philip Donnellan
brief_description: Program 2 looks at the fortunes and misfortunes of British immigrants to Prince Edward Island, through a re-enactment of their history, letters, diaries, and interviews with their children and grandchildren.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, British Broadcasting Corporation, Bill Brind and Philip Donnellan
